00021 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_ARGUMENT_CASTER_HPP
00022 #define CLPP_DETAIL_ARGUMENT_CASTER_HPP
00023 
00024 #include "misc.hpp"
00025 
00026 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00027 
00030 namespace clpp {
00031 
00034 namespace detail {
00035 
00038 struct argument_caster {
00039 public:
00040     void call_func_with_inputed_arg( const any& arg
00041                                      , const std::string& name
00042                                      , const std::string& value ) const {
00043         if      ( argument_must_be_bool( arg ) )               { call_with_bool_arg(               arg, name, value ); }
00044         else if ( argument_must_be_char( arg ) )               { call_with_char_arg(               arg, name, value ); }
00045         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_char( arg ) )        { call_with_signed_char_arg(        arg, name, value ); }
00046         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_char( arg ) )      { call_with_unsigned_char_arg(      arg, name, value ); }
00047         else if ( argument_must_be_int( arg ) )                { call_with_int_arg(                arg, name, value ); }
00048         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_int( arg ) )         { call_with_signed_int_arg(         arg, name, value ); }
00049         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_int( arg ) )       { call_with_unsigned_int_arg(       arg, name, value ); }
00050         else if ( argument_must_be_short_int( arg ) )          { call_with_short_int_arg(          arg, name, value ); }
00051         else if ( argument_must_be_long_int( arg ) )           { call_with_long_int_arg(           arg, name, value ); }
00052         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_long_int( arg ) )  { call_with_unsigned_long_int_arg(  arg, name, value ); }
00053         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_short_int( arg ) ) { call_with_unsigned_short_int_arg( arg, name, value ); }
00054         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_long_int( arg ) )    { call_with_signed_long_int_arg(    arg, name, value ); }
00055         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_short_int( arg ) )   { call_with_signed_short_int_arg(   arg, name, value ); } 
00056         else if ( argument_must_be_float( arg ) )              { call_with_float_arg(              arg, name, value ); }
00057         else if ( argument_must_be_double( arg ) )             { call_with_double_arg(             arg, name, value ); }
00058         else if ( argument_must_be_long_double( arg ) )        { call_with_long_double_arg(        arg, name, value ); }
00059         else if ( argument_must_be_string( arg ) )             { call_with_string_arg(             arg, name, value ); }
00060         else {
00061             notify_about_unsupported_type( name );
00062         }        
00063     }
00064 
00065     void call_func_with_default_arg( const any& arg ) const {
00066         if      ( argument_must_be_bool( arg ) )                { call_with_bool_arg(               arg ); }
00067         else if ( argument_must_be_char( arg ) )                { call_with_char_arg(               arg ); }
00068         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_char( arg ) )         { call_with_signed_char_arg(        arg ); }
00069         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_char( arg ) )       { call_with_unsigned_char_arg(      arg ); }
00070         else if ( argument_must_be_int( arg ) )                 { call_with_int_arg(                arg ); }
00071         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_int( arg ) )          { call_with_signed_int_arg(         arg ); }
00072         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_int( arg ) )        { call_with_unsigned_int_arg(       arg ); }
00073         else if ( argument_must_be_short_int( arg ) )           { call_with_short_int_arg(          arg ); }
00074         else if ( argument_must_be_long_int( arg ) )            { call_with_long_int_arg(           arg ); }
00075         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_long_int( arg ) )   { call_with_unsigned_long_int_arg(  arg ); }
00076         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_short_int( arg ) )  { call_with_unsigned_short_int_arg( arg ); }
00077         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_long_int( arg ) )     { call_with_signed_long_int_arg(    arg ); }
00078         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_short_int( arg ) )    { call_with_signed_short_int_arg(   arg ); } 
00079         else if ( argument_must_be_float( arg ) )               { call_with_float_arg(              arg ); }
00080         else if ( argument_must_be_double( arg ) )              { call_with_double_arg(             arg ); }
00081         else if ( argument_must_be_long_double( arg ) )         { call_with_long_double_arg(        arg ); }
00082         else if ( argument_must_be_string( arg ) )              { call_with_string_arg(             arg ); }
00083     }
00084 
00085     void store_default_value( const any& arg
00086                               , const any& value
00087                               , const std::string& name ) const {
00088         if      ( argument_must_be_bool( arg ) )               { store_bool_value(               arg, value, name ); }
00089         else if ( argument_must_be_char( arg ) )               { store_char_value(               arg, value, name ); }
00090         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_char( arg ) )        { store_signed_char_value(        arg, value, name ); }
00091         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_char( arg ) )      { store_unsigned_char_value(      arg, value, name ); }
00092         else if ( argument_must_be_int( arg ) )                { store_int_value(                arg, value, name ); }
00093         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_int( arg ) )         { store_signed_int_value(         arg, value, name ); }
00094         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_int( arg ) )       { store_unsigned_int_value(       arg, value, name ); }
00095         else if ( argument_must_be_short_int( arg ) )          { store_short_int_value(          arg, value, name ); }
00096         else if ( argument_must_be_long_int( arg ) )           { store_long_int_value(           arg, value, name ); }
00097         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_long_int( arg ) )  { store_unsigned_long_int_value(  arg, value, name ); }
00098         else if ( argument_must_be_unsigned_short_int( arg ) ) { store_unsigned_short_int_value( arg, value, name ); }
00099         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_long_int( arg ) )    { store_signed_long_int_value(    arg, value, name ); }
00100         else if ( argument_must_be_signed_short_int( arg ) )   { store_signed_short_int_value(   arg, value, name ); } 
00101         else if ( argument_must_be_float( arg ) )              { store_float_value(              arg, value, name ); }
00102         else if ( argument_must_be_double( arg ) )             { store_double_value(             arg, value, name ); }
00103         else if ( argument_must_be_long_double( arg ) )        { store_long_double_value(        arg, value, name ); }
00104         else if ( argument_must_be_string( arg ) )             { store_string_value(             arg, value, name ); }
00105         else {
00106             notify_about_unsupported_type( name );
00107         } 
00108     }
00109 private:
00110     bool argument_must_be_bool( const any& arg ) const                  { return typeid( b_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00111     bool argument_must_be_char( const any& arg ) const                  { return typeid( c_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00112     bool argument_must_be_signed_char( const any& arg ) const           { return typeid( sc_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00113     bool argument_must_be_unsigned_char( const any& arg ) const         { return typeid( uc_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00114     bool argument_must_be_int( const any& arg ) const                   { return typeid( i_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00115     bool argument_must_be_signed_int( const any& arg ) const            { return typeid( si_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00116     bool argument_must_be_unsigned_int( const any& arg ) const          { return typeid( ui_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00117     bool argument_must_be_short_int( const any& arg ) const             { return typeid( shi_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00118     bool argument_must_be_long_int( const any& arg ) const              { return typeid( li_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00119     bool argument_must_be_unsigned_long_int( const any& arg ) const     { return typeid( uli_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00120     bool argument_must_be_unsigned_short_int( const any& arg ) const    { return typeid( ushi_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00121     bool argument_must_be_signed_long_int( const any& arg ) const       { return typeid( sli_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00122     bool argument_must_be_signed_short_int( const any& arg ) const      { return typeid( sshi_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00123     bool argument_must_be_float( const any& arg ) const                 { return typeid( f_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00124     bool argument_must_be_double( const any& arg ) const                { return typeid( d_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00125     bool argument_must_be_long_double( const any& arg ) const           { return typeid( ld_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00126 public:    
00127     bool argument_must_be_string( const any& arg ) const                { return typeid( s_arg_p ) == arg.type(); }
00128 private:
00129     void call_with_bool_arg( 
00130             const any& arg, const std::string& name, const std::string& value ) const {
00131         b_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< b_arg_p >( arg ); 
00132         call< bool >( value, name, p );
00133     }
00134        
00135     void call_with_char_arg( 
00136             const any& arg, const std::string& name, const std::string& value ) const {
00137         c_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< c_arg_p >( arg );
00138         call< char >( value, name, p );
00139     }
00140 
00141     void call_with_signed_char_arg( 
00142             const any& arg, const std::string& name, const std::string& value ) const {
00143         sc_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< sc_arg_p >( arg );
00144         call< signed char >( value, name, p );
00145     }
00146 
00147     void call_with_unsigned_char_arg( 
00148             const any& arg, const std::string& name, const std::string& value ) const {
00149         uc_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< uc_arg_p >( arg );
00150         call< unsigned char >( value, name, p );
00151     }

00225     void call_with_string_arg( 
00226             const any& arg, const std::string& name, const std::string& value ) const {
00227         s_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< s_arg_p >( arg );
00228         call< std::string >( value, name, p );
00229     }
00230 private:
00231     template
00232     <
00233         typename ArgType
00234         , typename ArgHolderType
00235     >
00236     void call( const std::string&    inputed_value
00237                , const std::string&  parameter_name
00238                , ArgHolderType&      holder ) const {
00239         ArgType argument;
00240         try {
00241             argument = boost::lexical_cast< ArgType >( inputed_value );
00242         } catch ( const std::exception& /* exc */ ) {
00243             notify_about_error_type< ArgType >( parameter_name );
00244         }
00245         holder->func_with_arg( argument );
00246     }
00247 private:
00248     void call_with_bool_arg( const any& arg ) const {
00249         b_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< b_arg_p >( arg ); 
00250         p->func_with_arg( p->default_value );
00251     }
00252      
00253     void call_with_char_arg( const any& arg ) const {
00254         c_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< c_arg_p >( arg );
00255         p->func_with_arg( p->default_value );
00256     }
00257 
00258     void call_with_signed_char_arg( const any& arg ) const {
00259         sc_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< sc_arg_p >( arg );
00260         p->func_with_arg( p->default_value );
00261     }

00332 private:
00333     void store_bool_value( const any& arg
00334                            , const any& inputed_value
00335                            , const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00336         b_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< b_arg_p >( arg );
00337         store< bool >( inputed_value, p, parameter_name );
00338     }
00339

00437 
00438     void store_long_double_value( const any& arg
00439                                   , const any& inputed_value
00440                                   , const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00441         ld_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< ld_arg_p >( arg );
00442         store< long double >( inputed_value, p, parameter_name );
00443     }
00444 
00445     void store_string_value( const any& arg
00446                              , const any& inputed_value
00447                              , const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00448         s_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< s_arg_p >( arg );
00449         store< std::string >( inputed_value, p, parameter_name );
00450     }
00451 private:
00452     template
00453     < 
00454         typename ArgType
00455         , typename ArgHolderType
00456     >
00457     void store( const any& inputed_value, ArgHolderType& holder, const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00458         if ( typeid( ArgType ) == inputed_value.type() ) {
00459             holder->default_value = boost::any_cast< ArgType >( inputed_value );
00460         } else {
00461             notify_about_error_type_of_default_value< ArgType >( parameter_name );
00462         }
00463     }
00464 private:
00465     template< typename ArgType >
00466     void notify_about_error_type( const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00467         const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00468                                           + "Value's type for parameter '" + parameter_name 
00469                                           + "' must be <" + get_type_identifier< ArgType >() + ">!"
00470                                           ;
00471         throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00472     }
00473 
00474     template< typename ArgType >
00475     void notify_about_error_type_of_default_value( const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00476         const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00477                                           + "Default value's type for parameter '" + parameter_name 
00478                                           + "' must be <" + get_type_identifier< ArgType >() + ">!"
00479                                           ;
00480         throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened ); 
00481     }
00482 
00483     template< typename ArgType >
00484     std::string get_type_identifier() const {
00485         std::string identifier;
00486         
00487         if      ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( bool ) )                { identifier = "bool"; }
00488         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( char ) )                { identifier = "char"; }
00489         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( signed char ) )         { identifier = "signed char"; }
00490         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( unsigned char ) )       { identifier = "unsigned char"; }
00491         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( int ) )                 { identifier = "int"; }
00492         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( signed int ) )          { identifier = "signed int"; }
00493         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( unsigned int ) )        { identifier = "unsigned int"; }
00494         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( short int ) )           { identifier = "short int"; }
00495         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( long int ) )            { identifier = "long int"; }
00496         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( unsigned long int ) )   { identifier = "unsigned long int"; }
00497         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( unsigned short int ) )  { identifier = "unsigned short int"; }
00498         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( signed long int ) )     { identifier = "signed long int"; }
00499         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( signed short int ) )    { identifier = "signed short int"; }
00500         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( float ) )               { identifier = "float"; }
00501         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( double ) )              { identifier = "double"; }
00502         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( long double ) )         { identifier = "long double"; }
00503         else if ( typeid( ArgType ) == typeid( std::string ) )         { identifier = "std::string"; }
00504 
00505         return identifier;
00506     }
00507 
00508     void notify_about_unsupported_type( const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00509         const std::string what_happened = "Parameter '" 
00510                                           + parameter_name 
00511                                           + "' registered with function having argument's unsupported type!";
00512         throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00513     }
00514 };
00515 
00516 } // namespace detail
00517 } // namespace clpp
00518 
00519 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_ARGUMENT_CASTER_HPP
